item.title: It's time to sell this overly loved video game stock, says Carter Worth
item.description: Sometimes a stock is too popular or, in stock-market parlance, it's overbought.

item.title: The scale of Trump's 'Golden Dome' is a boon for defense stocks even if it isn't completed, says Bernstein
item.description: The firm pointed to some large defense names as potential beneficiaries, regardless of whether the system is completed by 2029.

item.title: Tesla could reach $2 trillion in market cap by end of 2026 as autonomous era begins in Austin, says Dan Ives
item.description: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives sees a rally of more than 55% ahead for Tesla.

item.title: Best Stocks: An under-the-radar play on the AI buildout that was founded more than 90 years ago
item.description: Josh and Sean note that AI spending remains on fire and discuss a Best Stock riding that wave you may not have heard about.

item.title: Trump deportations are a headwind for this fast-food stock, Stifel warns
item.description: Stifel lowered its rating on the stock to hold from buy.
